page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Mum, Dad and I get up at 8 o,clock and I put the kettle on for morning coffee.Mum and Bru, walk me to school, there the day starts as I walk through the gates and go onto the playground where I wait for the bell to ring.We have a big hall,large pleasant classrooms,playing fields all around us ,and we have our own swimming pool. We are kept very busy at school with many clubs at lunch time and after school.I am pretty tired when I get home. I usually watch television until it is time for tea. Most evenings I am very busy as I have French lessons, belong to the swimming club and go to Tap dancing lessons. I am ready for bed when I tumble in at 8 o,clock.
